thread.title: Rise of the Ronin - The Fight BTS | PS5 Games

author: Ava
title: Rise of the Ronin - The Fight BTS | PS5 Games
text: https://www.playstation.com/games/rise-of-the-ronin/ Join us in this second chapter of our Behind the Scenes series as we delve deeper into the combat features of Rise of the Ronin. From the veteran developers of Nioh and Ninja Gaiden – Rise of the Ronin introduces deeply engaging yet accessible combat, with layers of complexity that caters to a variety of playstyles. Learn more about melee and ranged weaponry, commanding unique special moves to prevail in combat in the world of 19th-century “Bakumatsu” Japan. Available March 22, 2024 only on PS5! #ps5games#ps5 #riseoftheronin #rotr Rated Mature Join us in this second chapter of our Behind the Scenes series as we delve deeper into the combat features of Rise of the Ronin. From the veteran developers of Nioh and Ninja Gaiden – Rise of the Ronin introduces deeply engaging yet accessible combat, with layers of complexity that caters to a variety of playstyles. Learn more about melee and ranged weaponry, commanding unique special moves to prevail in combat in the world of 19th-century “Bakumatsu” Japan.
